columns.text: This exercise will identify the future value of a bank deposit of $6,500 today with an interest rate of 8.1% compounded daily for five years. We will also determine the future value of the deposit at 10 and 20 years.

First, define what the future value is and how it is calculated.

The future value refers to the value of a cash flow at a future date. The future value considers the present value of the cash flow multiplied by the factor of the rate and period. The computation of future value can be expressed with the following equation:

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Future value} &= PV\times(1 + i)^t\
\end{aligned}$$

Where

$PV$, which represent the present value\
$i$, which refers to the rate \
$t$, which symbolizes the period

A. Let's solve the future value if the period is five years.

Since the compounding of interest is daily, we will multiply the number of days in a year by the deposit period, in this case, five.
$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Period} &= 365\times5
\\[5pt]
&= 1825
\end{aligned}$$

Therefore we will consider a period of 1825 in our calculation.

B. Next, calculate the future value of the deposit after ten years.

Let's determine the compounding period by multiplying ten years by the number of data in a year.

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Period} &= 365\times10
\\[5pt]
&= 3650
\end{aligned}$$

Hence, we will consider a period of 3650 in our calculation.

C. Last, let's identify the future value if the period is twenty years.

Calculate the daily compounding period by multiplying twenty years by the number of days each year.
$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Period} &= 365\times20
\\[5pt]
&= 7300
\end{aligned}$$

Hence, we will consider a period of 7300 in our calculation.

To summarize, we have determined the future value of the deposit by considering the rate and the period calculated based on daily compounding. The future value of the deposit at different years are as follows:

| Period   | Future value |
|----------|--------------|
| 5 years  | $9,745.03    |
| 10 years | $14,610.09   |
| 20 years | $32,839.18   |
